Text:
just finished downloading
this is real and in spanish, no english subtitles
great quality
thanks furtaperas!
do anybody know where i could get an english subs for this?

Calidad de Video y Audio esta muy buena.
La pelicula si que esta bien violento y no apta para menores.
Despues de haber visto la pelicula me he quedado con la boca abierta, sera artistico la peli pero no lo que esperaba, que es justo lo que los directores de cine deseaban con el guion.

Video and Audio Quality is superb (No Subtitles) , movie is not suitable for minors.
After watching the movie I was  surprised mostly in shock as to the violence, the plot is not what I expected but I'm sure this is what the director wanted. 

Mixed feelings and a bit disgusted.
